title: #92Noon! PA is Back! Thad Levine/Bruce Boudreau/Pete Bercich/Courtney Cronin
description: PA is back in studio.  Twins General Manager, Thad Levine, calls in to discuss the Twins spring training. Former Wild head coach Bruce Boudreau joins PA in studio to talk about his departure from the Wild for a long conversation covering everything from his departure from the Wild to his thoughts on the upcoming season.  Pete Bercich joins the show to discuss what the NFL season might look like.  And finally, ESPN journalist, Courtney Cronin breaks down the social justice work the Vikings have been a part of.
